item.title: WCOJ - Multi Way Joins
item.description: WCOJ - Multi-Way Joins. What are Multi-way joins? Why Multi-way joins? What is WCOJ? What makes it WCO? What are the options? Generic Join LFTJ Generic Join LFTJ How to think about parallelizing? References
